name: Esperance
description:
Through the eyes of the owner of the Coffee shop Esperance and his costumers, we follow the aftermath of something that changed the entire world Order. 

Different stories collides as they meet and open up to each other, and as we learn more about them through these 5 days, will we ever find out anything about the owner of the shop. Morgan?

And also find out how the door to Esperance can open anywhere around London for those that looks for it? 

You are all welcome to Esperance to find out. And seek some shelter now at the end of days. 

--------------------------------------------------

My first finished project in RPG Maker MZ. It was made in a hurry in a few days, and it shows. Not meant to be any sort of masterpiece, but just a small pat on my own back for finishing something. 

It might crash a few times, and my edits are buggy and some places has the wrong sprites, but it should be possible to get through. Even with my horrible writing and spelling.

There is a credit scroll in the end of the game to show what music, plugins and tiles I have used, but I will add here that the tiles and sprites as from the wonderful MalibuDarby, and their Horror city sets. And all the different plugins I have used to get this how I want is from VisuStella's MZ plugins. I could not have made anything without any of those.
